description:
A leading U.S. climate science denial group has been attempting to scupper major EU climate reforms by forging alliances with far-right figures, DeSmog and The Guardian can reveal.  The Heartland Institute, which has for decades been at the forefront of denying the scientific evidence for man-made climate change, claims that it worked with politicians in […]

The post U.S. Climate Denial Group Using Far-Right to Attack EU Green Policies appeared first on DeSmog.
title: U.S. Climate Denial Group Using Far-Right to Attack EU Green Policies
